title: Upgrade the macOS bots and software
body:
Bumping a few things:
 - the OS to macOS 10.14
 - Xcode to 10.2.1
 - mono to 5.18.1

> Removing the `System.Memory` NuGet as the types are now found in mono (resulting in https://github.com/xamarin/xamarin-macios/issues/5687). Mono 5.18 has been out since December 2018 and included in VS since March 2019.
